introduction: Human life has always been a mystery.We live burdened by a clouded destiny that is felt but never uttered.Today, an invisible force is reigning over what can be seen.And it reminds us that often the important things are what we cannot see.This is the story of families – people – living on this absurd planet.Filmmakers around the world are going through a tough time under the COVID-19 pandemic.However, despite this situation, we have started a new production.In the post-corona world, we want to once again check the connection with filmmakers around the world.From Japan, Chile, Mongolia and UK, we have collaborated with each countries creators and conducted a remote film production.
